name: GetLibraryStyleActions
description:
Retrieve library style analytics actions data by dimension.

Use this tool to obtain detailed actions data for styles in a Figma library, categorized by the specified dimension. Ideal for analyzing how styles are used or modified.

parameters.name: group_by_dimension
parameters.description: Specify the dimension ('style' or 'team') to group the returned analytics data by.

value_schema.description: A dimension to group returned analytics data by.

parameters.name: library_file_key
parameters.description: The unique file key of the Figma library to retrieve analytics data for.

value_schema.description: File key of the library to fetch analytics data for.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A cursor to indicate which page of data to fetch. Obtain this from a prior API call.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating what page of data to fetch. Obtained from prior API call.

parameters.name: earliest_week_start_date
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date string (YYYY-MM-DD) for the earliest week to include. Dates round back to the nearest week start. Defaults to one year prior.

value_schema.description: ISO 8601 date string (YYYY-MM-DD) of the earliest week to include. Dates are rounded back to the nearest start of a week. Defaults to one year prior.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date string (YYYY-MM-DD) for the latest week to include, rounded to the week's end. Defaults to the latest computed week if not specified.

value_schema.description: ISO 8601 date string (YYYY-MM-DD) of the latest week to include. Dates are rounded forward to the nearest end of a week. Defaults to the latest computed week.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the figma API.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor indicating what page of data to fetch. Obtained from prior API call.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating what page of data to fetch. Obtained from prior API call.

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: A dimension to group returned analytics data by.

value_schema.description: A dimension to group returned analytics data by.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date string (YYYY-MM-DD) of the earliest week to include. Dates are rounded back to the nearest start of a week. Defaults to one year prior.

value_schema.description: ISO 8601 date string (YYYY-MM-DD) of the earliest week to include. Dates are rounded back to the nearest start of a week. Defaults to one year prior.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date string (YYYY-MM-DD) of the latest week to include. Dates are rounded forward to the nearest end of a week. Defaults to the latest computed week.

value_schema.description: ISO 8601 date string (YYYY-MM-DD) of the latest week to include. Dates are rounded forward to the nearest end of a week. Defaults to the latest computed week.

parameters.name: file_key
parameters.description: File key of the library to fetch analytics data for.

value_schema.description: File key of the library to fetch analytics data for.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
